pages.text: The Advanced Fluid Placer builds upon the $(l:justdirethings:mach_fluidplacert1)Simple Fluid Placer$(/l)$(br2)It can place fluids in a larger area, and much like its partner, the $(l:justdirethings:mach_blockplacert2)Advanced Placer$(/l), the filter slots allow you to specify which blocks to place fluids on.
